name: Suoi Tien Amusement Park
description: Suoi Tien Amusement Park is an amusement park in District 9, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. The park includes several entertainment areas. The landscaping and attractions in the park illustrate Vietnam's history and legends, such as Au Co and Lac Long Quan as well as the Battle of Son Tinh and Thuy Tinh

reviews2: Wow what a place! Actually way better than we thought it would be! So so weird, not a single part of this entire park felt normal except for the overpriced and mid food. The rides? Strange, the attractions? Peculiar, the vibes? A little unsettling. And yet all staff couldn‚Äôt be nicer!! Definitely a Vietnam highlight!

name: Dai Nam Wonderland
description: Dai Nam Wonderland is a large, family-friendly entertainment and cultural complex in Binh Duong, Vietnam, featuring a mix of modern and traditional architecture. It includes a spiritual area with temples, an amusement park, an open zoo with rare animals, a water park, and a racecourse for various motorsports. It holds several national records for its scale, such as the largest temple, artificial sea, and longest hotel.

reviews1: Upon my initial awareness of this establishment during my July 2025 visit to Vietnam, I anticipated experiencing the go-karting and other activities offered. name: CYBER VINGAME
description: CYBER VINGAME is a gaming lounge in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, known for its modern setup and customer-focused services, including high-end computers, a separate smoking room, and a diverse food and drink menu

name: Zoo & Botanical Gardens.

reviews2: The quality of the movies is still ok, but the staff here is not very ok. The last time I went to see them, they had a double day today so I got free popcorn. The other female staff asked for the member's phone number, I read it 2, 3 times and she still pressed the wrong number and asked again, I just laughed it off. The theater here doesn't have a ticket checker, when I entered the theater, there were 2 other people who wanted to sit in row G with us, and they sat in seat number 9 that we just bought. These are the comments, if I want to come back to this branch next time, I will have to consider.

reviews2: The guys at Inside 10 points don't have any but. Thank you guys for enthusiastically supporting me in wishing my friend a happy birthday =))) The whole group was sitting there solving puzzles and then got to sing happy birthday to everyone.

reviews2: Was amazing. A must go. I dont think you can get this experience anywhere else in the world. Not even in Disneyland. reviews1: This is my first time here. The staff was very enthusiastic, explained how to play, showed me how to play in other rooms and even let me try it out. I went with 2 people and played for 15 minutes, but it was like going to the gym, so much fun, everyone should try it.

Welcome to Push Climbing, Ho Chi Minh City's premier indoor climbing gym, dedicated to fostering a strong, supportive, and skilled climbing community.
We are more than just walls and holds; we are a dedicated training facility that empowers climbers of all levels to push their limits, master new techniques, and achieve their vertical goals

reviews1: Our team enjoyed the team building event hosted by Ms Uyen and trainer Huy and flexible organizer Ms Minh Phuong. We unlocked the fear of heights safely by joining the games and supported by professional facilities and equipments as well as training though we understand this is just the basic and the easiest game. Highly recommend groups from school to working office to try the game and challenge yourself
reviews2:
Very good service, reasonable price
Professional and friendly staff,
Fully meet the needs of entertainment and training

name: Grand Park
description: Grand Park is an entertainment paradise located within the Vinhomes Grand Park megacity in Ho Chi Minh City. This is an ideal recreational destination, bearing the distinct hallmarks of famous theme parks like VinWonders Phu Quoc and VinWonders Nha Trang.
address: ƒê∆∞·ªùng Nguy·ªÖn Xi·ªÉn, Ph∆∞·ªõc Thi·ªán, ph∆∞·ªùng Long Th·∫°nh M·ªπ, Qu·∫≠n 9.
reviews1: It was so much fun, I went early on the weekday so it wasn't crowded. I didn't have to wait in line for long, it was fun, and the ticket price was reasonable. I recommend going with family or friends.
reviews2: Very nice. If you are in HCMC, you can take advantage of the weekend to come here for a change of pace. The kids will love it. If you have a resident card, the tickets will be much cheaper.

name: Snow Town
description: The Snow Play Zone, making its debut in Saigon, will bring a completely new and unique experience. Visitors will have the opportunity to enjoy activities such as Skiing, Snow Tubing, building Snowmen, and taking Selfies.
address: 125 ƒê. ƒê·ªìng VƒÉn C·ªëng, Ph∆∞·ªùng Th·∫°nh M·ªπ L·ª£i, Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, Th√†nh ph·ªë H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
reviews1:
Snow Town has been around for a long time, I came here mainly to avoid the heat and feel the snow, nothing else.
The snow town is quite crowded on weekends, but the staff is enthusiastic so it's still fun.
The highlight of the area is probably the ice slide, the rest of the scenery and check-in area look fake.
The jacket and shoes smell a bit damp.
The ticket price of 180k for both adults and children is quite reasonable.
reviews2: The indoor playground is located in the apartment complex, ticket price is 160k/adult, ideal place to bring children to play, there are many children here. There are only a few games, mainly skiing on a plastic slide, the area is also small, not many games.

name: Jump Arena
description:
Jump Arena is a diverse entertainment complex featuring various physical training activities such as rock climbing, rope ladder climbing, aerial challenges, ninja challenges, and bungee jumping, which are reserved for adults only.

The Jump Arena trampoline park also features a dedicated kids' area with gentler, more relaxing activities like free jump, basketball, dodgeball, and tag, which anyone can join. Nothing is more suitable for a weekend family outing in Saigon than this location.
address: 63 Xa l·ªô H√† N·ªôi, ph∆∞·ªùng Th·∫£o ƒêi·ªÅn, qu·∫≠n 2, th√†nh ph·ªë H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
reviews1: Strange game for children to exercise. 140k for a ticket + 50k for a pair of socks. Not crowded, 3 jumping areas but children can only play in 2 areas, the remaining area requires technique. Okay for the children's day off, away from the iPad.
reviews2:
The playground is quite large, children can run and jump comfortably. There is a place to climb, use safety ropes and instructors, the staff are cute.
The entrance ticket is a bit expensive compared to the quality of service provided.
There is a 60-day combo for sale, calculated at 30k/day.
Regular tickets are 100k/ticket for children over 6 years old, I think.

name: Kart 1
description:
With a length of 340m, the Go-Kart track is a sanctuary for speed enthusiasts and supercar lovers, reminiscent of the famous Hollywood movie "Fast & Furious."

All go-karts at Kart 1 are the latest equipment imported directly from Germany and feature integrated smart GPS chips to measure lap times and track performance for players. If you are a beginner, you should attend training sessions to get familiar with and try out the different tracks before competing officially with your friends or family.

reviews1: The 340m Go-Kart track at Kart 1 is an absolute sanctuary for speed demons‚Äîit truly delivers that "Fast & Furious" feeling! The German-imported karts are top-notch and feel incredibly responsive and professional. We loved the smart GPS chips that accurately tracked our times, making every lap competitive. If you‚Äôre serious about speed and racing quality, this is the place to be. Highly recommend the training session if you're new to karting!
reviews2: Kart 1‚Äôs 340m track feels like a true racing arena for anyone obsessed with speed and competition. The use of brand-new, German-imported karts with smart GPS tracking is fantastic, adding a professional layer to measuring performance. For beginners, the available training sessions are a massive plus, ensuring everyone gets comfortable before hitting the main race. This isn't just a fun ride; it‚Äôs an authentic racing experience, perfect for challenging friends.

name: Go Station Space
description: Go Station Space isn't just a skatepark‚Äîit's the definitive urban hub where movement, creativity, and speed collide. Inspired by the kinetic energy of a metropolitan transit station, this park is designed to be the ultimate launchpad for riders of all disciplines, from skateboarding and BMX to rollerblading.
